name: Tea Fairy Against The Flies
description:
Help tea fairy protect the tea cup from the evil insects (and arachnids) by vanishing them with her powerful spells.

If you encounter any bugs, please leave a comment here. :>

A and D to move left and right.  

SPACE to shoot.

ESC to pause

R to restart

Fly: moves in a zig-zag motion zoning in on the cup. she can't stun the player. 

Bee: target the player first but will go for the cup if she is close enough 

Spider: bounce around the screen she can stun the player and spoil the tea if she hits them. 

Green leaf: extra score if picked up before it vanishes 

Red leaf: kill all enemies on the screen if picked up 

Extra point zone: any enemy killed within this zone will give extra score.
